name: Crux - Du Connoiseur - No. 2 Short Lancero
additionalNotes: Du Connoisseur is crafted for the maverick in all of us. For the soul man hardwired to go against the grain, but still staying true nonetheless. Du Connoisseur is captivatingly rich revealing its true glory with notes of caramel and espresso for a restrained finish. Its distinctive shape is the perfect partner for introspective nights and restless spirits.
